import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-customers', templateUrl: './add-customers.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-customers.component.css'] }) export class AddCustomersComponent { public formData = { name: "", age: "", postCode: "", gender: "", street: "", houseNumber: "", order_amount: "", } }
